title: Elegant Emerald and Diamond Haaram with South Sea Pearls
materials: adorned with dazzling round cut Diamonds and vibrant Emeralds. Features lustrous South Sea Pearls with excellent nacre quality. Hyderabadi Polish enhances the gold's radiance.
features: This Haaram showcases a delicate floral design, featuring carefully set diamonds around emeralds. Suspended below are perfectly round South Sea Pearls, adding a touch of sophistication. The central pendant showcases a large, eye-catching emerald. The piece is designed for comfortable wear while providing a stunning statement.
colors: Predominantly gold with a vibrant contrast of green emeralds
occasions: and festive celebrations such as Diwali. Also suitable for modern events where you want to add a touch of traditional elegance. Suitable for Seemantham and Half-Saree functions.
description: A captivating blend of traditional design and contemporary style. The high-quality emeralds and diamonds provide exceptional brilliance. The South Sea Pearls add a touch of luxury and grace. Handcrafted in Hyderabad, ensuring exceptional quality and durability. A statement piece that will be treasured for generations.
